org.digitalertachograph.DDDQuery
Interface DataSource

All Known Implementing Classes:
DDDDataSource, DummyDataSource
public interface DataSource

The DataSource interface defines methods for a data source.

Method Summary
 XMLDumper getXMLDumper()
          Returns the XMLDumper object that dumps the data provided by setSource(byte[]) as XML.
 void setSource(byte[] src)
          Sets the byte array with the data of a DataSource object.
 

Method Detail

setSource

void setSource(byte[] src)
Sets the byte array with the data of a DataSource object.

Note: the class that implements this interface must provide a method that processes the data and generates a XMLDumper object of it.

Parameters:
src - the byte array with the data of the DataSource object

getXMLDumper

XMLDumper getXMLDumper()
Returns the XMLDumper object that dumps the data provided by setSource(byte[]) as XML.

Note: the class that implements this interface must provide a method that processes the data and generates a XMLDumper object of it.

Returns:
XMLDumper object that has been generated with the data
